name: Beware The Mothman
description:
THE MOTHMAN COMETH

You're a hiker who spent the whole day exploring your state's wonderful National Park. It's night time and about the perfect time for you to head home.

 BUT BE WARNED. 

When the moon falls, the Mothman prowls. Only light will keep him at bay.

CONTROLS:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Q and E to turn 
  • Space to craft Torches (must have at least 1 Wood and 1 Flint)

Font From Friday The 13th, developed by Norfok IFD

Font "Beware the Neighbors Shadow", Developed by Intellica Design

Enjoy!
